Cards.name: A Dab of Ink
Cards.flavour: The Poet's blood is the Empire's ink.

Cards.name: A Mother's Parting Gift
Cards.flavour: Nature was her domain,Love was her song,Family was her devotion,Knowledge was her gift.

Cards.name: Abandoned Wealth
Cards.flavour: When the world burned, the greedy burned with it, while the clever left as paupers.

Cards.name: Akil's Prophecy
Cards.flavour: The hatungo know many answers to the same question,for time itself is a tangled web.

Cards.name: Alluring Bounty
Cards.flavour: A treasure worth killing foris a treasure worth dying for.

Cards.name: Alone in the Darkness
Cards.flavour: "Sometimes, the most beautiful treasures...are the ones you cannot have."- Beryl, Survivor from the Azurite Mines

Cards.name: Anarchy's Price
Cards.flavour: Born of relentless fury and abhorrence, warped by turmoil and anguish, tainted through desire and carnality, I thirst for bloodshed once more.

Cards.name: Arrogance of the Vaal
Cards.flavour: Discovery can lead to beauty, or it can lead to ruin.

Cards.name: Assassin's Favour
Cards.flavour: By the time their eyes meet,the dark deal has long since been made,and his fate long since sealed.

Cards.name: Atziri's Arsenal
Cards.flavour: In the prison of all sins, will you grasp godhood or sorrow? Only hope lies under the shadows.

Cards.name: Audacity
Cards.flavour: A jolt, and it moves. Or smolders.A current, and it lives. Or dies.A surge, and it transcends.Or... not.Only one way to find out.

Cards.name: Azyran's Reward
Cards.flavour: Method transcends shape and size. Do something in parallel long enough, and you will always findanother way.

Cards.name: Baited Expectations
Cards.flavour: The line between having not enough to do and too much to do is unusually fine.

Cards.name: Beauty Through Death
Cards.flavour: Her beauty did not fadeher humanity did not survive.

Cards.name: Birth of the Three
Cards.flavour: A small token of Her affliction.

Cards.name: Blessing of God
Cards.flavour: When the darkness weighs upon you, grow light from within.

Cards.name: Blind Venture
Cards.flavour: "It's risky not knowing where your wares come from. That's why I source my own."- Klayver, the Antiquarian

Cards.name: Boon of Justice
Cards.flavour: Some gifts are obligations while others are simply opportunities.

Cards.name: Boon of the First Ones
Cards.flavour: Wreathed in the skin and bonesof the beasts she slew,her gift came from what she lost:her humanity.

Cards.name: Boundless Realms
Cards.flavour: Boundless is the distance between where we start and where we start again.

Cards.name: Bowyer's Dream
Cards.flavour: If this is my dream, I don't wish to wake.

Cards.name: Buried Treasure
Cards.flavour: You can't seek riches without getting your hands dirty.

Cards.name: Burning Blood
Cards.flavour: There's a place where up is down,where right is wrong,where pleasure is agony,and where the living wish only for death.

Cards.name: Call to the First Ones
Cards.flavour: The Ezomyte, desperate for aid, cried out to the gods.

Cards.name: Cameria's Cut
Cards.flavour: "There are two ways to pay, Gold and Blood. I'll take my share in both."-Cameria the Coldblooded

Cards.name: Cartographer's Delight
Cards.flavour: A map is similarto a pair of eyes,without one you stumblearound, unable to find your way.

Cards.name: Chaotic Disposition
Cards.flavour: Life isn't what you make of it, it's already been made for you.

Cards.name: Council of Cats
Cards.flavour: A King Loved By All,A Shadow Awaiting Nightfall,A Speaker Howling Away,A Hunter Seeking Prey

Cards.name: Coveted Possession
Cards.flavour: A taste of power brings a hunger for more.

Cards.name: Dark Dreams
Cards.flavour: No one ever truly understood what she meant when she said she wanted to raise a family.

Cards.name: Dark Temptation
Cards.flavour: "Only a fool looks to the occult for power and expects to be spared from its wrath."- Voll, Emperor of Purity

Cards.name: Death
Cards.flavour: The end of the old,the beginning of the new.A unique opportunity for transformation,for those with the powerto grasp it.

Cards.name: Deathly Designs
Cards.flavour: "The Karui was correct; there is virtue in honouring my ancestors."

Cards.name: Demigod's Wager
Cards.flavour: Sometimes you need to make your own luck.

Cards.name: Destined to Crumble
Cards.flavour: "Let us not forget the most important lesson the Vaal taught us:Nothing is eternal."- Siosa Foaga, Imperial Scholar

Cards.name: Dialla's Subjugation
Cards.flavour: A symbol of beauty and innocenceThe gems corrupted her mindMalachai corrupted her gemsAll but a glimmer ofgreatness lost in madness

Cards.name: Divine Justice
Cards.flavour: Many sought the Goddess' blessing. Few survived the Labyrinth to receive it.

Cards.name: Doedre's Madness
Cards.flavour: "Hold your tongue before I claim it." - Doedre Darktongue

Cards.name: Dying Anguish
Cards.flavour: Moribund, he gazed upon the journey taken as blood trickled down his chin. His eye closed on the city ahead that he would never call home.

Cards.name: Earth Drinker
Cards.flavour: Taste and grow strong. Drink too much and be buried.

Cards.name: Echoes of Love
Cards.flavour: "I gave up my body for you. I gave up my name for you. And one day I shall give up my life for you."

Cards.name: Emperor of Purity
Cards.flavour: True to his title,Voll, newly crowned,had many of theEternal Empire's signatureextravagances destroyed.

Cards.name: Emperor's Luck
Cards.flavour: The house always wins.

Cards.name: Etched in Blood
Cards.flavour: When you strive to write your name on the dense pages of History, someone else, inevitably, must be crossed out.

Cards.name: Forbidden Power
Cards.flavour: Some things should not be used. Some power is too great a risk.

Cards.name: Friendship
Cards.flavour: "Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames"-Rumi of the Vaal

Cards.name: Gemcutter's Promise
Cards.flavour: "I swore to use my position to help the people. What good is power when it just accumulates on the already-powerful?" - Erasmus, Imperial Gemcutter

Cards.name: Gift of the Gemling Queen
Cards.flavour: Our Lady Dialla,as a symbol of our progress,shines greater than all the gems.

Cards.name: Glimmer of Hope
Cards.flavour: When you dwell in total darkness, even the faintest light may guide you out.

Cards.name: Grave Knowledge
Cards.flavour: The dead tell me great insights. They've had nothing but time to sit and think.

Cards.name: Harmony of Souls
Cards.flavour: Shrieking souls locked awayHate splits frozen cells asunderThe knot of corruptionundone at last

Cards.name: Her Mask
Cards.flavour: To her beauty you submit,lest your neck the great Queen slit.

Cards.name: Heterochromia
Cards.flavour: Black and White, Silver and GoldLet us see the world UnfoldRed and Blue, Yellow and GreenLet us remake it in colours Unseen

Cards.name: Hope
Cards.flavour: The others succumbed to madness and depravity, but Lori fought on. Alone in the darkness, she could still see the dull light of hope's distant dawn.

Cards.name: House of Mirrors
Cards.flavour: What do you see in the mirror?

Cards.name: Hubris
Cards.flavour: "This one? It is NOT for sale. You would sooner pry it from my lifeless hand."- Jonfé Darontos, Ringmaker

Cards.name: Hunter's Resolve
Cards.flavour: Primed, curved and sleek.Decisive and final.For malice and righteousness.There's but one solution.

Cards.name: Hunter's Reward
Cards.flavour: To tame a beast, you first must subdue its heart.

Cards.name: Immortal Resolve
Cards.flavour: The threads of fate are the strongest ties.

Cards.name: Imperial Legacy
Cards.flavour: A life lost, A legacy born.

Cards.name: Jack in the Box
Cards.flavour: Turn the crank,close your eyes,and pray to the godsfor a pleasant surprise.

Cards.name: Lantador's Lost Love
Cards.flavour: {They fought the storm together as one,Until the longest of days was done.Their love grew strongerwith every breath,Until it was broken apart in death.}

Cards.name: Last Hope
Cards.flavour: As their civilisation crumbled, the Vaal looked to their queen. In her, they saw a way out. In them, she saw a burden she was happy to free herself from.

Cards.name: Left to Fate
Cards.flavour: Many strive for greatness,but it is challenge, unforseen,that forges heroes.

Cards.name: Light and Truth
Cards.flavour: Time and changeshall naught avail,To dim the Lightof Truth's fair grail.

Cards.name: Lingering Remnants
Cards.flavour: Never dying, yet not living,Endlessly they wanderbeneath the harvest moon.

Cards.name: Lost Worlds
Cards.flavour: "There are worlds that lie beyond the edge of my page, the edge of my understanding. Worlds of wonder. Worlds of terror."Aramil - Cartographer to Emperor Chitus

Cards.name: Loyalty
Cards.flavour: Bound by fate,inseparable by choice.

Cards.name: Lucky Connections
Cards.flavour: Luck is a fool's game, and I know plenty of rich fools.

Cards.name: Lucky Deck
Cards.flavour: When the outcome is the same, does it matter if it is fortune or trickery?

Cards.name: Lysah's Respite
Cards.flavour: So many memories,so much pain insuch a small token.Drown it in bloodso you can forget.

Cards.name: Mawr Blaidd
Cards.flavour: Rigwald believed he'd seized great power, but it was the great power that had seized Rigwald

Cards.name: Merciless Armament
Cards.flavour: "Through thick and thin,blood and bone,a peaceful lifeis one I can't condone."- Tukohama, Father Of War

Cards.name: Might is Right
Cards.flavour: The mind had much to endure before the advent of thaumaturgy.

Cards.name: Mitts
Cards.flavour: Those whose hands are their livelihood know the importance of keeping them safe and warm.

Cards.name: Monochrome
Cards.flavour: "You cannot portray the world using just one colour. Together, you and I, we will paint our world into perfection."- Kyra, renegade thaumaturgist

Cards.name: More is Never Enough
Cards.flavour: Greed is a hunger that only grows as you feed it

Cards.name: No Traces
Cards.flavour: There is no mistake so great that it cannot be undone.

Cards.name: Nook's Crown
Cards.flavour: Every skull was once a person.Though 'Who?' is rarely asked.Friends, who wearthe crown of Nook,Never need to ask.They remember.

Cards.name: Perfection
Cards.flavour: There are countless worlds, but only those with limitless potential will be able to achieve perfection.

Cards.name: Pride Before the Fall
Cards.flavour: As Kaom slew the last of his kin,something deep inside him broke.And through the cracks, corruption,pure and black, spread forth.

Cards.name: Pride of the First Ones
Cards.flavour: Upon silent paws and masked by the reeds,Farrul's hunt begins as the light recedes.

Cards.name: Prosperity
Cards.flavour: Accumulating wealth has its own costs.

Cards.name: Rain of Chaos
Cards.flavour: Fire filled the sky that nightChaos reignedWhere the shards fellAll was destroyed-Jozen Kasigi, retelling an urban legend of the Cataclysm

Cards.name: Rain Tempter
Cards.flavour: Be like water, friend.

Cards.name: Rats
Cards.flavour: Whoever said 'more is always better' has obviously never met a rat.

Cards.name: Remembrance
Cards.flavour: "For all your struggles, all your achievements, even for the greatest of us, a story is all that remains. Write it well."-Julius Perandus, Father of Chitus

Cards.name: Sambodhi's Vow
Cards.flavour: He dispels dark realmsuntil mortal sufferingsyield to hopeful light.

Cards.name: Scholar of the Seas
Cards.flavour: I've never come upon a ship I could not command. I have however met sailors that were not willing to be led.

Cards.name: Seven Years Bad Luck
Cards.flavour: If enough people believe something to be true, whether or not it is becomes irrelevant.

Cards.name: Shard of Fate
Cards.flavour: Their whims left unknown,Their life left for others.

Cards.name: Squandered Prosperity
Cards.flavour: "Our rulers are being ridiculous, and we are suffering."

Cards.name: Struck by Lightning
Cards.flavour: 'Lightning never strikes the same place twice'is really just wishful thinking.

Cards.name: Succor of the Sinless
Cards.flavour: Blessed is the blood of the beholden disciple. The earth is anointed by his step. The damnable are sanctified by his strike.

Cards.name: The Admirer
Cards.flavour: Lucian lost himself in ancient scrolls and found in those scrolls a love whose power bridged a millennium.

Cards.name: The Aesthete
Cards.flavour: "Some see our mortal flesh as a limitation. I see it as an opportunity for vast, miraculous improvements."- Shavronne of Umbra

Cards.name: The Archmage's Right Hand
Cards.flavour: "When grasped in his hand, even an ordinary piece of wood can make the heavens tremble with fear."

Cards.name: The Arena Champion
Cards.flavour: The fight is the easy part. It's the years of training that'll kill you.

Cards.name: The Army of Blood
Cards.flavour: I gave my mind without a fight,The twelfth hour I lost control.The day is gone but there is light,eyes that glow like red-hot coal.

Cards.name: The Artist
Cards.flavour: "Paint, metal, flesh... A true artist does not limit himself." - Malachai the Soulless

Cards.name: The Avenger
Cards.flavour: Justice comes swiftEqual to the crimeRevenge is a giftLife for a lifeEye for an eye

Cards.name: The Bargain
Cards.flavour: In the pursuit of power, as in that of wealth, anything goes.

Cards.name: The Battle Born
Cards.flavour: "No man can best me, no demon can fell me. For I vanquish all with my axe!"

Cards.name: The Beast
Cards.flavour: To know the monster, you must become the monster.

Cards.name: The Betrayal
Cards.flavour: It's sad times we live in when a friendship has a price people are willing to pay.

Cards.name: The Blazing Fire
Cards.flavour: Lethal, untouchable, keen, aflame. Just what I was looking for.

Cards.name: The Body
Cards.flavour: They say it is the head that leads, but all must flow through the body at some point.

Cards.name: The Bones
Cards.flavour: The flesh is a prison, and we are finally free.

Cards.name: The Breach
Cards.flavour: Ever get the feeling you're being watched...?

Cards.name: The Brittle Emperor
Cards.flavour: "When Voll spared Malachai, accepting his aid in pursuit of Purity, the strongest faith was infected by Corruption and made brittle as glass."- Victario, the People's Poet

Cards.name: The Cacophony
Cards.flavour: Nothing can be heard above the din or seen amongst the turmoil. The senses are shattered. All is left to fate.

Cards.name: The Calling
Cards.flavour: Blood flows not just through veins, but through worlds.

Cards.name: The Carrion Crow
Cards.flavour: From death, life.From life, death.The wheel turns,and the corbies wheel overhead.

Cards.name: The Cartographer
Cards.flavour: It's always easier to find your way if you draw a map of the progress you've made.

Cards.name: The Cataclysm
Cards.flavour: The mighty warriors traded in blows, the nimble archers in arrows, yet it was the brazen thaumaturgists who would bring catastrophe to all.

Cards.name: The Catalyst
Cards.flavour: Simple actions can lead the world to an early grave.

Cards.name: The Celestial Justicar
Cards.flavour: Wrapped in the glory of the heavens, she comes to mete out justice for the fallen.

Cards.name: The Celestial Stone
Cards.flavour: Stare into its depths too long, and you may lose yourself entirely.

Cards.name: The Chains that Bind
Cards.flavour: Scarier than any criminal is an innocent man in chains, for when he breaks free, his revenge will be justified.

Cards.name: The Cheater
Cards.flavour: Sometimes the best way to achieve greatness is to use a shortcut.

Cards.name: The Chosen
Cards.flavour: They whose lives were given to clothe the Dark Dreamer... They were the lucky ones.

Cards.name: The Coming Storm
Cards.flavour: No man may hope to turn back the storm. You can only hope you do not attract its ire.

Cards.name: The Conduit
Cards.flavour: The path to godhood is guided by the hand of sacrifice.

Cards.name: The Craving
Cards.flavour: What was once a passing thought tickling the back of the mind is now a desperate, driving desire.

Cards.name: The Cursed King
Cards.flavour: The First Onesmay be blasphemy,but they arepowerful blasphemy.

Cards.name: The Damned
Cards.flavour: Souls along a conduit of blood,from one vessel to the next.

Cards.name: The Dapper Prodigy
Cards.flavour: "Many believe murder is a grisly, grim, and grotesque crime. Then there are those who simply make art of it."

Cards.name: The Dark Mage
Cards.flavour: With staff in handand wrath in heart,your soul and corpseshall surely part.

Cards.name: The Darkest Dream
Cards.flavour: A dream from which you cannot awake is nothing other than a nightmare.

Cards.name: The Deal
Cards.flavour: In the pursuit of wealth, as in that of power, anything goes.

Cards.name: The Deceiver
Cards.flavour: Beware the combatant who shows no confidence, yet still enters the ring, for they are surely hiding something.

Cards.name: The Deep Ones
Cards.flavour: "The Seas Call, the Mad Answer"

Cards.name: The Demon
Cards.flavour: A man who hears voices may not necessarily be crazy.

Cards.name: The Demoness
Cards.flavour: Wherever she went, death was sure to follow.

Cards.name: The Doctor
Cards.flavour: "They said I needed my head examined, but I'd rather just take yours." - Klopek the Cannibal

Cards.name: The Doppelganger
Cards.flavour: Upon seeing her face, I am terrified—the moon shows me my own form!

Cards.name: The Dragon
Cards.flavour: Scaly beast of the skies,watching with his golden eyes.Shadow that blocks out the sun,it's too late for you to run.

Cards.name: The Dragon's Heart
Cards.flavour: They say when a dragon dies, the flesh smoulders and burns until all that remains is the still, white-hot, heart.

Cards.name: The Dreamer
Cards.flavour: A dark note dripsfrom the dreamer's lips,A honeyed melody.We stand, we fallon his beck and call,for in his dream we're free.

Cards.name: The Dreamland
Cards.flavour: All dreams vanish when the dreamers wake.

Cards.name: The Drunken Aristocrat
Cards.flavour: The finer the brew, the harder it is to remember drinking it.

Cards.name: The Easy Stroll
Cards.flavour: "I'm going for a walk. I'll be back soon." - Blonca's last words

Cards.name: The Eldritch Decay
Cards.flavour: Time dismantles all things eventually, but some wish to accelerate the process.

Cards.name: The Encroaching Darkness
Cards.flavour: No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.

Cards.name: The Endless Darkness
Cards.flavour: Gaze towards the stars, but beware what gazes back.

Cards.name: The Endurance
Cards.flavour: Crimson rubies, drops of vigour,flowing through my veins,flesh like coal, try to crush me,diamond is what remains.

Cards.name: The Enlightened
Cards.flavour: Weaving the six,a serpent stands tall.Wearing a crown,the thousand petals call.

Cards.name: The Escape
Cards.flavour: In fleeing reality, you step into the realm of madness.

Cards.name: The Ethereal
Cards.flavour: "Long ago, people looked to the stars, believing they influenced us. Soon, it will be us who influence the stars."- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturge

Cards.name: The Explorer
Cards.flavour: A map is only useful if you know where you stand.

Cards.name: The Eye of Terror
Cards.flavour: The Lord of Chaos dreams as his Eye gazes, unblinking, at his prize. And soon, all shall tremble before his waking form.

Cards.name: The Eye of the Dragon
Cards.flavour: Some powers are far too great even for thegods of old.

Cards.name: The Fathomless Depths
Cards.flavour: Fall into endless night; a voyage into an ocean of oblivion.

Cards.name: The Feast
Cards.flavour: Shame what happened to my husband. He had such good taste.

Cards.name: The Fiend
Cards.flavour: Your era is now,your power unwavered,soon we will seewho the gods truly favoured.

Cards.name: The Fishmonger
Cards.flavour: However vicious Rhoas might be, a dedicated angler may in time tame them.

Cards.name: The Fletcher
Cards.flavour: Let these fine arrows pack a punch.

Cards.name: The Flora's Gift
Cards.flavour: Sturdy and strong,grown from the stream.The Flora that live here,A combatant's dream.

Cards.name: The Fool
Cards.flavour: Even the most learned man is a fool to his own fate.

Cards.name: The Formless Sea
Cards.flavour: Formless might,Wild beauty tamed,The brine of gods,The seas restrained.

Cards.name: The Forsaken
Cards.flavour: You gave us life and love, more than you could spare. Now you're gone, and we are stranded, alone, cold and without purpose.

Cards.name: The Fox
Cards.flavour: "Masters of wit, strength and cunning. To survive the harsh winters, you must be like the fox."- Ezomyte Proverb

Cards.name: The Gambler
Cards.flavour: "I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

Cards.name: The Garish Power
Cards.flavour: Maligaro may have valued function over form, but that did not mute his flair for the dramatic.

Cards.name: The Gemcutter
Cards.flavour: In the hands of a master craftsman, a worthless pebble can adorn the crown of a king.

Cards.name: The Gentleman
Cards.flavour: "Axes and mauls are so uncivilised. A good clean cut to the neck with a sharp blade, that's the Sarn way!"

Cards.name: The Gladiator
Cards.flavour: The thumb turns downand the crowd roars,they want deathand the blood is yours.

Cards.name: The Golden Era
Cards.flavour: Before gemlings, before thaumaturgy, a simple court magician could enthrall the masses.

Cards.name: The Hale Heart
Cards.flavour: Though the years weakened his mind, his body remained deadly as ever.

Cards.name: The Harvester
Cards.flavour: Taste not of theirforbidden fruit.Theirs is a harvest ofthe darkest kind,twisted, rotten anddamned for eternity.

Cards.name: The Hermit
Cards.flavour: The hermit's only friend is the greenery he can find.

Cards.name: The Heroic Shot
Cards.flavour: Try a thousand times, and eventually you'll have to give up.

Cards.name: The Hoarder
Cards.flavour: "More! I want more!" - Faendris, the Insatiable

Cards.name: The Hunger
Cards.flavour: "How many lives have you consumed?""How many times have you blinked?"

Cards.name: The Immortal
Cards.flavour: "Greetings! Just because you think I'm greedy doesn't mean I'm not willing to share. You'll just have to kill me first."-Grandmaster Dy'Ness

Cards.name: The Incantation
Cards.flavour: When there is no other choice, even the meekest whisper can bring about the greatest storm.

Cards.name: The Innocent
Cards.flavour: His brother would not atone, so he took his brother's life, and with it, his sins.

Cards.name: The Inoculated
Cards.flavour: Chaos spread, wreaking havoc and death. They said none would be spared, and yet here I stand.

Cards.name: The Insatiable
Cards.flavour: A lust for souls. The urge to kill just to satisfy its thirst. An unbearable burden that would make even the purest heart blacken over time.

Cards.name: The Inventor
Cards.flavour: Jump right in,But bewareOf things brokenOr beyond compare.

Cards.name: The Iron Bard
Cards.flavour: Do the simple words usedalone cause men to cheer?One hundred others mightjust as soon make a jeer.Perchance it was the turnof the tone in this bit.See how their hearts shone once,by my song, they were lit.

Cards.name: The Jester
Cards.flavour: Summoned for the King's desire,soon applause came from the court.However insanity was his only sire,so the King's reign was cut short.

Cards.name: The Jeweller's Boon
Cards.flavour: The jeweller's true talent is the capacity to see a jewel's beauty before they draw it out.

Cards.name: The Journey
Cards.flavour: Oh the places you will go, the sights you will see, the things you will meet.

Cards.name: The King's Blade
Cards.flavour: "To know for what you fight. To get up again when you've been struck down. To outmanoeuvre someone faster, trick someone smarter, crush someone stronger. That's what it takes to claim the crown."- Daresso, the King of Swords

Cards.name: The King's Heart
Cards.flavour: 500 times Kaom's axe fell, 500 times Kaom's Heart splintered. Finally, all that remained was a terrible, heartless Fury.

Cards.name: The Landing
Cards.flavour: Warriors of a distant land, you embark on a journey from which you may not return, but which we will be all the better for.

Cards.name: The Last One Standing
Cards.flavour: The strongest emerge from suffering. The toughest bear the most scars. The sole survivor claims the greatest of rewards.

Cards.name: The Lich
Cards.flavour: When the dead raise and master their own, the land is truly lost.

Cards.name: The Life Thief
Cards.flavour: "The process of eternal youth is a give and take. You give them death and take their youth."- Zerphi of the Vaal

Cards.name: The Lion
Cards.flavour: The Eternals lauded his valour. The Karui relished his defeat. Yet the final thoughts of Marceus Lioneye were naught but lament for his pride.

Cards.name: The Lord in Black
Cards.flavour: Thy knee shall bendin shifting dark,thy blade shall serve his vigil.Thy oath shall bind theeto his mark,thy flesh shall bear his sigil.

Cards.name: The Lord of Celebration
Cards.flavour: Though they were a pack of elite combatants, the Emperor's royal guards were not ready to face one of his notorious parties.

Cards.name: The Lover
Cards.flavour: "I wanted to give you three things. I've given you my eternal love. I've sung to you my most beautiful song. I'd have given you the moon last, but it couldn't be found. I hope you'll accept this instead."

Cards.name: The Lunaris Priestess
Cards.flavour: Embrace the Light,Await the Morrow,No more Spite,And no more Sorrow.

Cards.name: The Mad King
Cards.flavour: Fear the man who lusts for power, for he will do anything to get it.

Cards.name: The Master
Cards.flavour: In a world filled with chaos, he could always seek comfort in the hands of his master.

Cards.name: The Master Artisan
Cards.flavour: Perfection is the standard, excellence will be handled on a case by case basis.

Cards.name: The Mayor
Cards.flavour: A ruler is only as powerful as he is wealthy.Control the coin, control the empire.

Cards.name: The Mercenary
Cards.flavour: Loyalty can be bought. Just make sure you know who the buyer is.

Cards.name: The Metalsmith's Gift
Cards.flavour: A month's work, a year's wages, a foolish shortcut through a Rhoa's nest, and a grieving bride-to-be, who never received her betrothed's great gift.

Cards.name: The Mountain
Cards.flavour: Charmed by beautiful stonesConsumed with thepursuit of perfectionEver deeper into the waiting dark

Cards.name: The Nurse
Cards.flavour: We tried to tell him to get his head checked.

Cards.name: The Oath
Cards.flavour: An oath once made is an oath never broken. Do not delay in keeping it, for I take no pleasure in fools.

Cards.name: The Obscured
Cards.flavour: Our world, dangerous as it is, is far safer than what lies just beyond our sight.

Cards.name: The Offering
Cards.flavour: Eternal beauty has a cost, one which Shavronne was happy to pay with the lives of others.

Cards.name: The Old Man
Cards.flavour: Hear me, fish! I love and respect you, but before this day ends I will kill you dead.

Cards.name: The One With All
Cards.flavour: Embrace death to honour the lost,no fear in life no matter the cost.With one of all we are,and all of one we trust,throughout past, present and future... be just.

Cards.name: The Opulent
Cards.flavour: Wealth can, in fact, buy happiness.

Cards.name: The Pack Leader
Cards.flavour: Become the leader you were born to be.

Cards.name: The Pact
Cards.flavour: "On this day I mark the first of many agreements that I will have with this land and its people."

Cards.name: The Penitent
Cards.flavour: First, I gave my wealth, and we went hungry. Next, I gave my land, and we were homeless. Then, I gave my family, and I was alone. Last, I gave my eyes, and all I could dream was mine.

Cards.name: The Poet
Cards.flavour: God had forsaken the landAnd Victario wept.Corruption consumed the landAnd Victario's tears turned to blood.

Cards.name: The Polymath
Cards.flavour: Genius knows no limits.

Cards.name: The Porcupine
Cards.flavour: The first quill separates the quick learners from the dead.

Cards.name: The Price of Loyalty
Cards.flavour: "Forge me a carapace from their skin, imbued with their soul. Then feed their flesh to the hounds."

Cards.name: The Price of Protection
Cards.flavour: To protect her mansion, she would cut a deal with anyone. Anything.Something answered.

Cards.name: The Primordial
Cards.flavour: We play at God with our necromancy,but forces far more potentsleep within these stones.

Cards.name: The Professor
Cards.flavour: The academic route to knowledge is wide and well-trodden; but it is the untaught one who scales the mountain.

Cards.name: The Progeny of Lunaris
Cards.flavour: Born beneath silver light, bearing Lunaris' mark.Conjuring all his might, the Prodigy turned light to dark.

Cards.name: The Puzzle
Cards.flavour: As countless fractures weaken the divide, nightmares seep through from the other side.

Cards.name: The Queen
Cards.flavour: The power of the world,lies upon your hands.

Cards.name: The Rabid Rhoa
Cards.flavour: "Experiment 22A: Rhoas, when deprived of water, secrete a most delightfully potent toxin."- Maligaro

Cards.name: The Realm
Cards.flavour: If you wish to rush into strange places, be prepared to face strange things.

Cards.name: The Risk
Cards.flavour: "There is no right or wrong choice, no best or worst. There are only choices and their consequences."

Cards.name: The Rite of Elements
Cards.flavour: A mind as quick as lightning,fists as hard as stone,a heart that burns with fury,and eyes that chill to the bone.

Cards.name: The Road to Power
Cards.flavour: A beacon on the horizon; a guiding light, a call for help, or a warning to turn back.

Cards.name: The Ruthless Ceinture
Cards.flavour: In combat, a warrior must first be resourceful,and second, decisive.

Cards.name: The Sacrifice
Cards.flavour: For some, the price of power is never too great.

Cards.name: The Saint's Treasure
Cards.flavour: Publicly, he lived a pious and chaste life of poverty. Privately, tithes and tributes made him and his lascivious company very comfortable indeed.

Cards.name: The Samurai's Eye
Cards.flavour: At night, when the seas are calm, and the skies dark, he can see it. The formless fiend that took his eye, and fractured his mind.

Cards.name: The Scarred Meadow
Cards.flavour: The earth offers nourishment, growth and healing. Unless, of course, the sky has other plans.

Cards.name: The Scavenger
Cards.flavour: Take small pieces of things and then assemble them together

Cards.name: The Scholar
Cards.flavour: It is with the smallest of words that we find the largest of truths.

Cards.name: The Seeker
Cards.flavour: All that is flawed is worthless. The slightest error, and this might as well be trash.

Cards.name: The Sephirot
Cards.flavour: If the path to divinity were simple, we'd all be gods.

Cards.name: The Side Quest
Cards.flavour: You'll never know the things you miss if you keep your eyes closed

Cards.name: The Sigil
Cards.flavour: Three men travelthrough the gate;they carry a protective ward.A faction conspiresagainst their fate,but magic unravels the sword.

Cards.name: The Siren
Cards.flavour: At the beck and callof The Siren's hand,winter ravagesthe trembling land,and the weight of ice that bindswill break the strongest of minds.

Cards.name: The Skeleton
Cards.flavour: They stand among us, and within us.

Cards.name: The Soul
Cards.flavour: "Most people only have one. I'm a bit of a hoarder."

Cards.name: The Spark and the Flame
Cards.flavour: When sky meets ground the flames can be found, but who has the will to tame them.

Cards.name: The Spoiled Prince
Cards.flavour: A boy who grows up with everything learns to appreciate nothing.

Cards.name: The Standoff
Cards.flavour: Sometimes your greatest enemy is the only one keeping you breathing.

Cards.name: The Stormcaller
Cards.flavour: If you beckon theLord of Lightning,do not be surprisedwhen you are struck.

Cards.name: The Strategist
Cards.flavour: Know thine enemy better than you know thyself.

Cards.name: The Summoner
Cards.flavour: To own a piece of the Nightmare, you must first belong to the Nightmare.

Cards.name: The Sun
Cards.flavour: Each night, the light dies, and each morning she is born anew, embracing the land in her golden wings.

Cards.name: The Surgeon
Cards.flavour: "He might be lacking in vision, but his virtuosity is undeniable."- Malachai, on Maligaro

Cards.name: The Surveyor
Cards.flavour: Exploring lands made of flesh and sorrow, we'll reap and plunder like there's no tomorrow.

Cards.name: The Survivalist
Cards.flavour: A lucky numberFor us allTo help us throughThe perils told.

Cards.name: The Sword King's Salute
Cards.flavour: Many were slain by the sword kingTheir blood decorating his ringThose who retreated were slaughteredThose who fought bravely were honoured

Cards.name: The Thaumaturgist
Cards.flavour: "Mastery of thaumaturgy is like any other pursuit; it requires dedication and sacrifice. Sometimes several sacrifices."- Shavronne of Umbra

Cards.name: The Throne
Cards.flavour: A king's movement is unwavering.

Cards.name: The Tinkerer's Table
Cards.flavour: Trying to bring your vision to life is enough to drive you mad.

Cards.name: The Tower
Cards.flavour: A tower built of the strongest stone is not eternal; a towering intellect is not enlightened.

Cards.name: The Traitor
Cards.flavour: Sometimes an apprentice becomes a master through countless hours of hard work and practice.Sometimes it happens by force.

Cards.name: The Trial
Cards.flavour: You cannot journey to new lands until you have the courage to leave the safety of home.

Cards.name: The Twilight Moon
Cards.flavour: The day is dying, the night is born, the air grows cool, the sky is torn.

Cards.name: The Tyrant
Cards.flavour: "Fear controls the masses."- Laszlo, the Scourge

Cards.name: The Undaunted
Cards.flavour: "Fate was always my nemesis...But it didn't stop me then, and it won't stop me now."- Kjetilbrann, The Undaunted

Cards.name: The Undisputed
Cards.flavour: To create something truly spectacular, you must risk total failure.

Cards.name: The Union
Cards.flavour: On the 21st of Eterni,two become one,their light outshinesthe setting sun.

Cards.name: The Valkyrie
Cards.flavour: The villain strikes,the world is torn.A war begins, a hero is born,The nemesis sets the sky alight.A hero's sacrificesets everything right.- Drake's Epitaph

Cards.name: The Valley of Steel Boxes
Cards.flavour: "The most valuable treasures should be hidden in plain sight."- Ina, Keeper of Goods

Cards.name: The Vast
Cards.flavour: Can you hear the siren's calls,Just beyond the sea?A voice which heartsof men enthralls,I too am hooked to thee.

Cards.name: The Visionary
Cards.flavour: Lioneye looked to the heights of glorious victory. And thus he missed the defeat right under his nose.

Cards.name: The Void
Cards.flavour: Reach into the Void and claim your prize.

Cards.name: The Warden
Cards.flavour: Brutus' first innovation as Lord Incarcerator was a weighted chain around every neck so that his prisoners would forever bow to him.

Cards.name: The Warlord
Cards.flavour: To cure the Goddess,and break the chains of corruption,you must shatter the world.

Cards.name: The Watcher
Cards.flavour: Strange eyes on top of spinesGaze beyond the veil of timeDeep down below the minesA dream of crimson and of grime

Cards.name: The Web
Cards.flavour: A weapon, a shelter, a prison.The web's purpose changeswith the spider's needs.A lesson we shouldtake to heart.

Cards.name: The Wilted Rose
Cards.flavour: Though the path to divinity is fraught with peril, hope may bloom from within.

Cards.name: The Wind
Cards.flavour: Weaving through the cracks, searching for weaknesses, silent, indiscriminate, leaving sorrow in its wake.

Cards.name: The Witch
Cards.flavour: A wanderer in the wild strivesAgainst countless foes he survivesA fool pursues a quest contrivedBy the gift of the witch, alive.

Cards.name: The Wolf
Cards.flavour: The largest beasts cannot be overpowered. The Greatwolf teaches us to use guile, not strength, to probe for the soft flesh and strike deep.

Cards.name: The Wolf's Legacy
Cards.flavour: The howls and cackling could not mask the sadness.

Cards.name: The Wolf's Shadow
Cards.flavour: "If I fall, we will fall together with my fangs in your throat."

Cards.name: The Wolven King's Bite
Cards.flavour: A wolf does not bite his mate as he does his prey, yet both begin with bared teeth. Know who you are, and you will know the meaning of the bite.

Cards.name: The Wolverine
Cards.flavour: Claw them from the bottom, you'll be glad that you have got 'em, claw them from the top, you'll never want to stop.

Cards.name: The World Eater
Cards.flavour: Its body knows no limits. Its appetite knows no bounds.

Cards.name: The Wrath
Cards.flavour: "Daughter of catastrophe, mother of pain. Amongst the filth of Wraeclast, she wanders, and her wrath follows." - Quintoon the Returned

Cards.name: The Wretched
Cards.flavour: Necromancers, believe me, are more terrifying than their thralls.

Cards.name: Thirst for Knowledge
Cards.flavour: A ravenous mind can readily take in ideas from any source.Fortunately for the scholars, he has already learned about sustainability.

Cards.name: Three Faces in the Dark
Cards.flavour: For every threat you spy in the shadows, there are two others you don't.

Cards.name: Three Voices
Cards.flavour: The village elders had a curious rule: If you hear three voices scream for aid, flee as fast as you can.

Cards.name: Thunderous Skies
Cards.flavour: Many that have wielded the power of lightning have said that death by electrocution looks like the victim is more alive than ever before.

Cards.name: Time-Lost Relic
Cards.flavour: Time cannot wash away that which cannot be forgotten.

Cards.name: Tranquillity
Cards.flavour: Beware the sudden calm, for it is a sure sign of a storm on the horizon.

Cards.name: Treasure Hunter
Cards.flavour: "Don't worry, I know what I'm doing."- Toggo's Last Words

Cards.name: Turn the Other Cheek
Cards.flavour: "Only after one forsakes rage, can true power be found."- Sekhema Asenath

Cards.name: Underground Forest
Cards.flavour: "In the forest again... But at least I have these."

Cards.name: Vile Power
Cards.flavour: Dread and dangermakes the air feel thin.Above, power slumbers, tempting fate.Greed and ambitiondraws countless in,For those who seek powercan never wait.

Cards.name: Vinia's Token
Cards.flavour: You can change your name, but you cannot change your history.

Cards.name: Void of the Elements
Cards.flavour: Though the forces of nature are mighty and intimidating, it is their absence which should be feared.

Cards.name: Volatile Power
Cards.flavour: Unlimited power is apt to corrupt the minds of those who possess it.

Cards.name: Wealth and Power
Cards.flavour: The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth or power he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to positively affect those around him.
